title: Basic Accounting
description: This course covers fundamental principles of accounting including bookkeeping, journals, and ledgers. It also prepares students for the CPA exam.

title: Financial Accounting
description: An introductory course covering the accounting cycle, financial statements, and GAAP principles.

title: Introduction to Administration of Justice
description: This course provides an overview of the justice system, covering crime, law enforcement, and judicial organization.

title: Introduction to Business
description: This course introduces key business principles including management, marketing, and finance.
